propel.core.validation.propertyMetadata

Class RestrictedStringPropertyMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.validation.propertyMetadata.AbstractPropertyMetadata<T>
      • propel.core.validation.propertyMetadata.NullablePropertyMetadata<java.lang.String>
        • propel.core.validation.propertyMetadata.StringPropertyMetadata
          • propel.core.validation.propertyMetadata.RestrictedStringPropertyMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPropertyMetadata<java.lang.String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestrictedEdgesStringPropertyMetadata

    public class RestrictedStringPropertyMetadata
extends StringPropertyMetadata
    Class aiding in validation of strings, preventing certain characters from appearing in the string

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CANNOT_CONTAIN
      Error message when a string cannot contain a character
